title: Introducing: ST.MARTiiNS
content:
Dundee outfit ST.

MARTiiNS have been around for a few years in various guises, having been in a band together since their early teens, and featuring on these pages before, but now it appears that theyâ€™ve reached their most coherent, fully realised sound so far. Their debut outing, Bad Art, seemingly draws from the likes of The 1975 and Two Door Cinema Club, in the frenetic guitar riff, and cutting, straight to the point songwriting. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
